comments: A pangram is a sentence using every letter of the alphabet at least once.

cases.description: Check if the given string is an pangram
comments: Output should be a boolean denoting if the string is a pangram or not.

cases.input: the quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog
a quick movement of the enemy will jeopardize five gunboats
the quick brown fish jumps over the lazy dog
the 1 quick brown fox jumps over the 2 lazy dogs
7h3 qu1ck brown fox jumps ov3r 7h3 lazy dog

cases.description: pangram with mixed case and punctuation
cases.input: "Five quacking Zephyrs jolt my wax bed."

cases.description: upper and lower case versions of the same character should not be counted separately
cases.input: the quick brown fox jumps over with lazy FX
